title: Blessed With a Curse
description: What doesn't kill me - had better start running...Storm GennaroWhen the past calls Storm Gennaro for assistance, he willingly comes to help the man who walked away from him. Thirty years is a long time to be parted from the one person meant to stand at your side forever.Heath Madden is sick, and his family calls Storm to help save him. All the hurt and betrayal suffered at the man's hands resurfaces, but not everything is as it seems.The past has come back to wreak havoc on their lives, and as they dig deeper, they realize they aren't the only ones whose lives are being played with.
author: N.J. Nielsen
